meanings.definition: A person or machine that labels items.
meanings.sent1: The labellers at the factory put stickers on the products.
meanings.sent2: The labellers in the store labeled all the boxes with prices.
meanings.sent3: The labellers decided to play a game where they labeled everything in the room.
meanings.sent4: She was like a labeller, carefully placing words on each page of the book.
meanings.sent5: The labellers worked diligently, ensuring each item had the correct label.

meanings.sent1: The labellers at the event were responsible for tagging all the items.
meanings.sent2: We hired labellers to help organize the inventory in the warehouse.
meanings.sent3: The labellers at the party got creative and started labeling people with funny names.
meanings.sent4: In her mind, she saw herself as a labeller, assigning characteristics to everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The labellers were like artists, adding a touch of organization to chaos.
